page.title: 03A Saturday in Pitsea .
page.content: Saturday is the most enjoyable day in the week.I go to Pitsea Market which is open from 9 o'clock in the morning until 4 o'clock in the afternoon.It has many interesting stalls and a few shops.I also normally go to my local sweetshop which is Gowers where I buy lots of sticky sweets. For lunch I go to the chipshop to buy Fish and Chips which is one of the many foods which they sell.After I have eaten, to refresh myself, the local swimming pool is the ideal place.For 10p to get in and 10p for the locker it isn't really an expensive hobby.After all that exercise my house is a great place place to put my feet up and go to sleep. by Marie Edgecombe,aged 11.
